title: HR Analytical System
description: Built an appraisal system that analyzes employee performance data and generates reports using Bayesian classification and Decision Tree algorithms. Applied PCA, Truncated SVD, and Chi-Square for feature selection; utilized Pandas, and NumPy for data processing and analysis.

title: FinTrack
description: Developed an AI Finance platform for managing income and expenses with AI-based receipt scanning and categorization.

title: DrivsyAI
description: Developed an AI Car Marketplace that enables users to explore car listings by name or image upload.
